about_the_game:
Darkfall Shadows: Dr. Grimshaw's Descent

Step into the ominous world of Darkfall Shadows, a 2D puzzle-adventure where light and darkness weave a haunting tale of guilt, obsession, and the unravelling mind of Dr. Alistair Grimshaw. Drawn to the decaying Darkfall Manor by the disappearance of a young girl, you, the detective, embark on an investigation that will lead you through twisted dimensions, uncovering secrets buried in the shadows. What begins as a search for answers becomes a chilling confrontation with the darkness and Grimshaw’s own horrifying past.

Darkfall Shadows blends the atmospheric tension of classic noir with Victorian Gothic horror, set within a world where every shadow holds a secret, and every step leads you deeper into darkness.

Key Features:

Engaging Storyline:

Unravel the dark legacy of Dr. Grimshaw, a scientist obsessed with unlocking the power of a mysterious artifact known as the Voidstone. As you explore Darkfall Manor, you’ll piece together Grimshaw’s descent into madness and his tragic attempts to save his daughter, Elara, only to face the terrifying consequences of his actions.

Spectral Shift:

Harness the power of the Spectral Shift to switch between two dimensions—the real world and the Dark World, a shadowy, decayed version of reality. Use this ability to uncover hidden paths, reveal clues obscured by the dark, and solve puzzles that require you to manipulate both worlds simultaneously.

Shadow Walking:

Create a Shadow Remnant—a spectral clone of yourself that can be controlled independently. This shadow can interact with objects, traverse through otherwise inaccessible areas, and help you solve puzzles that require precise timing or simultaneous actions. As the story progresses, the connection between the detective and his shadow deepens.

Shadow Portals:

Travel through Shadow Portals, mysterious gateways that transport you between corresponding locations in both the real world and the Dark World. These portals allow for non-linear exploration and present complex multi-room puzzles that challenge you to think across both dimensions.

Gameplay Highlights:

  • Intricate Puzzles: Encounter a variety of puzzles that will challenge your intellect, including light and shadow based puzzles, Spectral Shift challenges, Shadow Walking mechanics, and Shadow Portal traversal. You’ll need to master these mechanics to uncover the secrets of the manor and progress deeper into the story.

  • Atmospheric Visuals: Experience the game’s unique blend of Victorian Gothic aesthetics and film noir atmosphere, where every shadow hides a secret and every step pulls you further into the manor’s dark history.

  • Rich Narrative: Explore the deep lore of Darkfall Manor and its tragic inhabitants. Every puzzle you solve and clue you discover reveals another layer of Dr. Grimshaw’s obsession with dark energy, the Voidstone, and his heart-breaking quest to save his daughter. As you navigate the shifting realities, you’ll experience both the psychological horror of Grimshaw’s guilt and the supernatural terror of the darkness.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1, or Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 or AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 460 or AMD Radeon HD 6870
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card

short_description: Darkfall Shadows is a 2D puzzle-adventure where you, a detective, explore the eerie Darkfall Manor to uncover its sinister past. Use shadow manipulation and dimension-shifting abilities to solve puzzles and reveal the tragic tale of Dr. Grimshaw and his daughter, in this noir-inspired mystery.
